abilities.description: Oars' unique technique using the Gomu Gomu powers - a massive butt stomp attack. Created by Oars himself, not by Luffy.

strengths: Immunity to blunt attacks and electricity
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Vulnerable to cutting and piercing attacks
description: Allows the user's body to stretch, expand, and snap back like rubber. The user becomes immune to blunt attacks and electricity but gains standard Devil Fruit weaknesses.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts one hundred arms in a concentrated area to create a tree-like formation for restraining opponents.

strengths: Can sprout body parts on any surface
Versatile for combat, espionage, and utility
Can create complex formations with multiple limbs
weaknesses: User feels pain from sprouted body parts
Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
description: Allows the user to sprout duplicates of their body parts on any surface, including living beings and objects. The user can create complex structures using multiple sprouted limbs.
